component.name: searchPatient
component.description: Search Patient using the given parameters

component.name: searchAllergyIntolerance
component.description: The AllergyIntolerance resource defines the substance that elicited the response, as well as when the reaction occured, the severity, and the type of reaction noted.

component.name: searchMedicationOrder
component.description: The FHIR MedicationOrder resource defines detailed information about a medication that was ordered for a patient, including prescriptions or OTC drugs ordered in an ambulatory clinic.

component.name: searchMedicationStatement
component.description: The FHIR MedicationStatement resource defines detailed information about medications being consumed by a patient, including medication prescriptions, OTC drugs ordered in an ambulatory clinic, and medications reported by a patient.

component.name: searchCondition
component.description: The FHIR Condition resource defines detailed information about a Condition, problem, or diagnosis relevant to the health of the patient.

component.name: searchFamilyMemberHistory
component.description: The FHIR FamilyMemberHistory resource defines a patient's family history. This resource returns the current status, age, and medical and surgical history of relatives related to a specific patient.

component.name: searchObservation
component.description: The FHIR Observation resource defines information about a measurement or simple assertion made about a patient.

component.name: searchDiagnosticReport
component.description: The FHIR DiagnosticReport resource contains information about a single diagnostic service performed for a patient.

component.name: searchImmunization
component.description: The FHIR Immunization Resource provides information about a patient's immunizations

component.name: searchProcedure
component.description: The FHIR Procedure resource defines an activity performed on or with a patient as part of the provision of care

component.name: searchDocumentReference
component.description: The FHIR DocumentReference resource describes information about a document

component.name: searchCarePlan
component.description: The FHIR CarePlan resource is a broad container for summarizing the plan of treatment for a patient.

component.name: searchGoal
component.description: The FHIR Goal resource defines objectives for a patient based on a current condition or recent procedure.

component.name: searchDevice
component.description: The FHIR Device resource describes information about a specific patient's durable, manufactured medical items.
